keyMappings:
# Unmapping
unmapAll

# Navigating the Page
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map k scrollUp
map j scrollDown
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map <c-f> scrollPageDown
map <c-b> scrollPageUp
map gh scrollToLeft
map gl scrollToRight

# Navigating Frames
map gf nextFrame
map gF mainFrame

# URL and Input
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map i focusInput
map gk goUp
map gj goToRoot

# Vomnibar
map I Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map # Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map * Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map : Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

# Find
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

# Navigating History
map <c-a> goForward
map <c-x> goBack
map R reload hard

# Manipulating Tabs
map 0 firstTab
map $ lastTab
map w nextTab
map b previousTab
map x removeTab
map X closeOtherTabs
map u restoreTab
map . duplicateTab
map d0 closeTabsOnLeft
map d$ closeTabsOnRight
map ' togglePinTab
map , moveTabLeft
map ; moveTabRight
map \ moveTabToNewWindow

# Links
map v LinkHints.activateMode
map g? LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito

# Page

# Marks
map m Marks.activateCreateMode
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode

# Special
map [ goPrevious
map ] goNext
map V enterVisualMode

# Miscellaneous
map ? showHelp
map gs viewSource
map ! passNextKey
map M toggleMuteTab
searchEngines:
!d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s
!g: https://encrypted.google.com/search?hl=en&q=%s Google
!gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
!map: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
!w: http://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
!so: http://stackoverflow.com/search?q= Stack Overflow
